word: WE HAVE BEEN WITNESSES OF THE GREAT AFFLICTION THROUGH WHICH BROTHER AND SISTER WHITE HAVE PASSED IN THE SEVERE AND DANGEROUS SICKNESS OF BROTHER WHITE. THE HAND OF GOD IN HIS RESTORATION IS TO US MOST APPARENT. PROBABLY NO OTHER ONE UPON WHOM SUCH A BLOW HAS FALLEN EVER RECOVERED. YET A SEVERE SHOCK OF PARALYSIS, SERIOUSLY AFFECTING THE BRAIN, HAS, BY THE GOOD HAND OF GOD, BEEN REMOVED FROM HIS SERVANT, AND NEW STRENGTH GRANTED HIM BOTH IN BODY AND MIND.
